ceremony.title: The Ceremony
ceremony.description: Please join us as we exchange our vows in an intimate ceremony. The chapel is located in the heart of the city with beautiful views of the water.

party.title: The Celebration
party.description: After the ceremony, we'll move to the Grand Hotel for dinner, drinks, and dancing! Be ready to party the night away with us.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.description: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift of all. However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, we have a registry at the following store or a honeymoon fund contribution would be greatly appreciated.

rsvp.title: RSVP
rsvp.deadlineText: Please let us know if you can make it by July 1st, 2026.
rsvp.thankYouMessage: We've received your RSVP. We can't wait to see you!
